name: THE OFFSEASON: A Blaseball Playset for Fiasco
name_original: THE OFFSEASON: A Blaseball Playset for Fiasco
description:
It's the off season of the Internet Blaseball League, the foremost splort in the world. The Internet Series has just wrapped up. Maybe it's your team that won. Maybe you couldn't even clinch the playoffs. But however you did... that's it, for now. Now it's just you, your team mates, and the deafening silence between now and the next Season.

What do blaseball players do off the field? What lives do they lead? Where do they go when the thousands of eyes of their fans have left the stadium?

There are no Umpires watching you now (as far as you know). It's time to fulfill your own agendas.

Play Ball.

_____________________________________________________________

Created for the We Are All Love Blaseball tabletop jam. 
Requires Fiasco, by Bully Pulpit Games.
Made with Fiasco Mustache.

We Are From Chicago.
